name: survey-reference
title: Survey Reference
description: A dcterms:BibliographicResource related to a dwc:Survey.

fields.name: referenceID
fields.title: Reference ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: surveyID
fields.title: Survey ID
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a globally unique identifier.

fields.name: relationshipType
fields.title: Relationship Type
fields.description: A relationship of a subject resource to a dcterms:BibliographicResource.
fields.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.
fields.rdfs:comment: The relationship of the subject (identified by dwc:resourceID) to the object (identified by dwc:relatedResourceID).
